name: missourian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Missouri: Missourians have picked the winner of every presidential election. Missourians worry that a "spring rise" in the river could cause floods.
More examplesFewer examplesA Missourian is more likely to be white, older and live alone than the average U. S. resident.The Missourian was scathing in his assessment of his California colleague. I think she's let her fellow Missourians down.

belonging or relating to the US state of Missouri or its people: Warsaw is a typical small Missourian town. Many Missourian reporters and editors remain wary about the program.
More examplesFewer examplesHe moved to New York with his new Missourian wife."We Missourian women are a sturdy breed," she said.One of the men of the Missourian company tried to swim across the river.
